page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I wake up at six thirty,I lie in bed reading and then get up.I make my bed and dress.Once i've had my breakfast,I feed my rabbit.I call for Natalle and go to school along with my sister. When we get to school we put our packed lunch box in the Hall and play until the buzzer goes.We then change our shoes,take off our coats and have our first lesson_English.We then have our play and snack. After maths it's dinnertime and I eat my packed lunch.In school again we have different lessons,swimming,music, tennis and In The News_a radio programme.After break we have topic. I go home with a friend and play with her.After tea I clean out the rabbit,play some more ,go to bed at eight thirty and read till nine fifteen.
